attributes.action: Drugs and Alcohol awareness - more PSCHE lessons in school for year 7,8 and 9
attributes.additional_details: Children do not know enough about the effect associated with drugs and alcohol, with more PSCHE lessons for years 7,8 and 9 (11-14 year olds) children will become aware of the risks that come with drugs and alcohol, and ultimately avoid them. Ideally, the government should make it compulsory to have two PSCHE lessons per month so important matters such as drugs and alcohol can be discussed in a safe environment.
